  The personal website of Duncan Garmonsway.
---

```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = FALSE)
```

I am a data scientist in the UK [Government Digital
Service](https://gds.blog.gov.uk/) and have previously worked for [Scottish
Power](https://www.scottishpower.co.uk/) and
[various](https://www.mbie.govt.nz/) [New](http://www.police.govt.nz/)
[Zealand](http://www.nzdf.mil.nz/) [ministries](https://www.justice.govt.nz/).
I studied English Literature at [University College
London](https://www.ucl.ac.uk/) and Applied Statistics at [Victoria University
of Wellington](https://www.victoria.ac.nz/).

I wrote [Spreadsheet Munging
Strategies](https://nacnudus.github.io/spreadsheet-munging-strategies), a guide
to getting data out of complex spreadsheets using my R packages
[tidyxl](https://nacnudus.github.io/tidyxl) and
[unpivotr](https://nacnudus.github.io/unpivotr).  I am an
[ROpenSci](https://ropensci.org/about/) reviewer.  Find more of my work on
[CRAN](ftp://cran.r-project.org/pub/R/web/checks/check_results_nacnudus_at_gmail.com.html)
and [GitHub](https://github.com/nacnudus/).

I am a [Christian](https://www.churchofengland.org/our-faith/what-we-believe)
and have been a member of the choirs of [Wellington Cathedral of Saint
Paul](https://www.wellingtoncathedral.org.nz/), [St Mary's Cathedral,
Glasgow](https://thecathedral.org.uk/), and [Pinner Parish
Church](https://www.pinnerparishchurch.org.uk/).  I play the
[violin](https://www.facebook.com/groups/amorchuk/), badminton, and go [cycle
touring](https://www.crazyguyonabike.com/).

Read https://rweekly.org/ for more R blogs.
